author: jtyberg
msg: Move file path normalizing method to FileUtils class.

author: jtyberg
msg: Propagate resume and pause events from PhoneGap JavaScript to PhoneGap
The resume and pause callbacks trigger the PluginManager on the native side,
which in turn invokes the onResume and onPause methods for each plugin.
